organizations.name: justice society of america returns in legends of tomorrow

text:
The Justice Society of America Returns In Legends of Tomorrow's "Camelot/3000" Synopsis Russ Burlingame 
The CW has released the official synopsis for "Camelot/3000," February 21's episode of DC's Legends of Tomorrow . 
You can check it out below. 
The Legends continue their quest to hunt down the Spear of Destiny before the pieces fall into the hands of the Legion of Doom. The Legends discover that pieces of the Spear are each being guarded in different time periods by members of the JSA. 
Their first stop is the future where they find Dr. Mid-Nite (guest star Kwesi Ameyaw) which eventually leads them to the past and King Arthurâ€™s Camelot, where Stargirl (guest star Sarah Grey) is protecting her piece of the Spear. In order to protect the Spear shard from the now-evil Rip Hunter (Arthur Darvill), the Legends must join forces with the Knights of the Round Table. 
Caity Lotz, Franz Drameh, Victor Garber, Brandon Routh, Dominic Purcell, Nick Zano and Maisie Richardson-Sellers also star. Antonio Negret directed the episode written by Anderson MacKenzie.
